data.question: How many different products do we sell at Engagedly?
data.answer: Engagedly currently has 2 products in the market, namely: Engagedly and Mentoring Complete

data.question: Where can you find us?
data.answer: You can find us at our website http://www.engagedly.com/

data.question: How many people work at Engagedly?
data.answer: Engagedly currently employs 150 people from many different countries.

data.question: How do I reset my password?
data.answer: To reset your company E-mail password, call us at 100.
